metadata.title: CVE-2021-38014 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds write in Swiftshader in Google Chrome prior to 96.0.4664.45allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
